title: The Night Clenched in Your Hands
summary:
Collection of one-shots by author Umino Tsunami.

**Volume 1**:
1. **Tamagoyaki** (Baked Eggs, たまごやき)
2. **Kiseki no Haru** (The vernal wonder, 奇跡の春)
3. **Sekai no Owari ni Kimi wo Omou** (I think of You in the End of the World, 世界の終わりに君を想う)
4. **Ryoute ni Ai wo Tsukame!** (Hold Love in both Hands!, 両手に愛をつかめ!)
5. **Reform Tousan** (Re-form—find Enjoyment in my Life, リフォーム父さん)

**Volume 2**:
1. **Shounen Ningyo** (Little Merman, 少年人魚)
2. **2-banme ni Suki na Hito** (The Second Favorite Person, 2番目に好きなひと)
3. **Chance wo Choudai** (The Ultra Great Operation of Love, チャンスをちょうだい)
4. **Poolside no Ningyo Hime** (Princess Goldfish, プールサイドの人魚姫)
5. **Juuni Yoru - Christmas no Juuni Nichi** (Twelfth Night, 十二夜―クリスマスの十二日―)

title: Beneath the Surviving Princess Joyful Facade
summary:
When the king offers Aerik Cladinae his own sister's hand in marriage for his meritorious deeds in battle, he didn't expect to get saddled with a limping, drooling woman like Miesa Esquillre.

Driven insane by her brother's physical and psychological torture, Miesa rolls around on the ground, spills food all over herself, and screams unintelligebly as a way of communicating. But sometimes, Aerik catches a flash of shrewd understanding behind those vacant eyes.

Is Miesa truly as mad as everyone thinks... or is she hiding something?

title: Mount Hua Sect’s Genius Phantom Swordsman
summary: After being ambushed by the Demonic Cult, Goheon Dok and Hyeonjo, his close friend from Mount Hua, are cornered and on the verge of losing their lives. Before they're both killed, Hyeonjo hands Goheon the Plum Blossom Spirit Beads, a sacred relic of Mount Hua that causes Goheon to take possession of the body of Muhwi, an apprentice of Hyeonjo. Now, as a Senior Disciple of Mount Hua, Goheon Dok must fight to protect Mount Hua and fulfill his friend's dying wish.

title: It’s voice phishing, but it’s a life reversal
summary: No summary available.

title: It’s Finally Love, Demon Lord!
summary:
A work packed with stories that make you cry, smile, and heal. A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter or Pixiv.

List of Stories (in **bold** = scanlated):

1. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home (Oneshot)** (ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版)): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/72034786), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1394956053461315585).
One-shot version of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

2. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home - After Story** (一描き下ろし後日話)
A newly drawn after story of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

3. **My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby** (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/79083715), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1374662950787551232).

4. **Four Patterns of Love** (4つの恋模様): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89467880).

5. **The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans** (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88553623), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1372125964876931075).

06. **To You at 17** (17歳のキミへ。): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79817585), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1217750845460058112).
A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai.

7. **Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen** (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1414132353115426816).

8. **Seeing the Sea With an Angel** (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89166096), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1382272880931532804).

9. **WORLD END WANKO**: Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1512347577408053250?cxt=HHwWhICjhfyG-PwpAAAA).

10. **The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life** (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/75086414), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1384809850538917895).

11. **The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years** (100年生きた猫の話): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89015686), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1464174470495498249).
This is a story of a cat that has become immortal, wandering through the course of its lifetime to find happiness.

12. **Shimono-kun's Quiet Girlfriend** (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88224680), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1367052638500495360).

13. **The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl** (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88878648), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1377199075192303618).

14. **The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga** (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89807719), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1392419305199788032).

title: The Caring Young Lady Wants to Be a Wall
summary: Irina de Claudel is reincarnated as a mob from her favorite BL game. She is trying to get Henri and Noel, her favorite coupling, to get together, and while she is taking care of them, they both love her...! All I want to do is to be a wall...! Will Irina be able to bring them together? A slapstick love comedy in which you will be loved by the characters of a BL game!

title: At the Duke’s Command
summary: Poisoned to death by her own betrothed?! Eunha didn’t wake up in a novel’s story just to get killed off again as an unfortunate extra! To change her story she needs a cover… 6 months pretending to be the fake fiancée of the novel's male protagonist, Duke Noah Wynknight. But will this cold-hearted, angel-faced demon of a man really help her avoid another ill-fated ending?!

title: Late Regret
summary:
Uruwashi Maria, a student at the Hananomiya private academy is a strong-willed and selfish "villainess." Her life is on easy mode and she has no enemies, but one day the memories of her past life come to her. Suddenly she remembers that in her previous life she was a normal high school girl. And she’s seen this life of hers play out before in a manga she read in her previous life! According to memories of her past life, Maria is killed by somebody in the manga. "And I don't know who did it because I died before I could read the ending!"  
  
Can Maria avoid her death and find happiness?

title: Black Fox: Sword Master Of Mount Kunlun
summary: A true Taoist’s martial arts exorcism record!  A mysterious organization seeks to unleash yokai upon the world, plunging it into chaos. While tracking them down, the master suddenly disappears.  Ten years later.  A lone Taoist practitioner, Tang Chan, encounters Jin Seorang, who is being pursued by dangerous men. Out of curiosity, Tang Chan decides to rescue Jin Seorang.  Amazed by Tang Chan’s martial prowess and Taoist arts, Jin Seorang seeks his help.  Jin Seorang’s enemy, Plum Moon Hall, is one of the infamous Seven Demon Clans, a sinister martial sect known for brainwashing people and turning them into yokai servants.  As Tang Chan helps Jin Seorang break Plum Moon Hakl’s dark magic, they discover that Plum Moon Hall’s leader knows the whereabouts of Tang Chan’s missing master.  Facing an unknown malevolence, Tang Chan realizes that Plum Moon Hall, the Seven Demon Clans, and an even greater force in the shadows are all tied to his master’s disappearance.  Even after all his master’s efforts, the world remains in turmoil. A young Taoist who follows the will of the heavens continues to wield his taoist arts, striving to restore balance to the world!

title: I Was Mistaken As a Monstrous Genius
Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Martial Evolution: Start by Awakening the King of Monsters
summary: A youth named Yi He is reborn into the world of powerful Martial arts and awakens the King of Monsters with the strongest bloodline!

title: Disastrous Necromancer
summary:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer! Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges. What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?

---

**Original Webtoon:**  
- [KuaiKan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/18819/)

**Official Translations:**  
- **English**: 
  - [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/necromancer-the-ultimate-scourge)
  - [Webnovel](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/necromancer-the-ultimate-scourge!_32189339808001201)
  - [Webcomics](https://webcomicsapp.com/comic/The-Necromancer-Scourge-Incarnate/67d2567f62661d2b396f4062)
- [Japanese](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/159311)
- [French](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/catastrophic-necromancer/list?title_no=6587)
- [Russian](https://recomics.org/manga/necromancer-i-am-the-disaster)

title: When the Broken Saintess Touches Love
The Great Sage of the Namgung Clan
summary:
At the command of the Bodhisattva of Mercy, the Great Sage, Heaven’s Equal, Sun Wukong, returns to the human world.
But everything has changed. The demons have disappeared, and powerful martial artists now rule the land.
As Sun Wukong roams this new world, searching for his lost master’s soul, he becomes entangled with the reincarnations of his old allies and uncovers the hidden truths of the martial arts world.
A grand conspiracy unfolds—former demons reborn as humans, secret techniques long forgotten, and a power struggle that threatens the balance of the world.

title: How Can There be a Divorce When We Haven’t Even Married, Your Majesty?
summary: As a self-proclaimed expert on archdukes of the north, Krisha has one goal in life. To marry one. However, all her plans are immediately overturned when she finds out she's already married to the emperor. To make matters worse, he wants a divorce! If that happens, not only will she become a divorcee at age 21, but she'll be banished from the mainland for the next 10 years. Though she sets out to give the emperor a piece of her mind, little does she know he's not the only obstacle to her dream...

title: Playing the Perfect Fox-Eyed Villain
summary: Shihu Lee has logged 20,000 hours playing Let's Kill the Demon Lord! for the past 5 years. But when the game takes a turn he doesn't like, Shihu cancels his pre-order of the DLC in anger, only to find himself sucked into the game! Now in the body of Julian Kreipart Prason, the villain, he has to play the part perfectly to survive the many enemies around him while unable to use the moonlight blade, Julian's signature ability. Under the watchful eye of Eileen, the genius gold mage, and his family members who want him gone, can Julian make it?

title: Prepaid Dragon King Tanks Everything!
summary:
“You ate me, so at least give me some kind of compensation, yeah?!”

Dragon King: “Fine! I’ll give you a prepaid cultivation technique—comprehend it first, then catch up with the training later!”

Me: “You think that’s enough?! I had to smell your nasty dragon breath—mental damage times two, buddy!”

Dragon King: “What do you want from me?!”

Me: “From now on, we’re like immortals sharing a single health bar. All the damage? You take it!”

Dragon King: “Damn it! You lunatic! Why does my ten-thousand-war-chariots-level HP bar feel so short now?! Guess it’s time to get a job…”

title: Level 999 Goblin
summary:
The protagonist Kim Chulsoo works his ass off for a living as a manual laborer in real life and by grinding for and selling items in a game.

He finally gets the chance to switch to a hidden class, hoping for that one big shot in life…!

But the hidden class turns out to be... a Goblin Summoner?!

title: Interspecies Protection Agency
summary:
Count Carlos is a half-demon, a hybrid of demon and human?!

Sera, who was kicked out of the mansion where she had worked for 10 years overnight for discovering the Count’s secret. Barely managing to find a new job, she ends up at the ‘Xenogeneic Protection Management Bureau’.

Sera, who became the caretaker of the vampire ‘Vlad family’, thought she would live happily with the xenogeneic beings, but…

The previous caretaker stole the Vlad family’s heirloom ‘Red Gem’ and ran away? Sera is threatened by the family to find the ‘Red Gem’.

By night a caretaker, by day searching for the heirloom, even a suspicious crown prince approaches Sera, who is struggling…

Will the new caretaker Sera be able to safely retrieve the Red Gem?

title: Magic Lord
summary: A man was reincarnated as Van, a boy of noble birth, who grew up to become a child prodigy through hard work. But when it was discovered that he possessed "production magic," he was immediately relegated to a remote village. However, his magic, which was called useless, turned out to be truly extraordinary, capable of producing anything as long as he had the right ingredients! With the knowledge from his previous life and the overpowered magic, the small, poor village will grow to become into a great city.

title: Making Love in a World Where It’s Taboo
summary:
"You want to make a baby with me, right?" Having never made love before, The Prince and his wife are in for a steamy night. Once they get a taste, they'll never be able to go back.

(Source: Coolmic)

title: A Hero Who Is Good At Everything
summary:
Gang-in Na wakes up in the year 2024 in the middle of South Korea with no memory of where or who he is. Upon hearing a voice that sounds strangely familiar, he comes face to face with a robot named **ACE** (*Autonomous Combat Entity*), who informs him that he was once part of the Earth Federation Forces in the year 2082 and possesses a wide array of skills. Gang-in decides to join forces with **ACE** to recover his lost memories and adapt to life on Earth, but the two look to be in for a bumpy ride.

---

**Original Webtoon:**  
- [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=831551)
- [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=11564928)

**Official Translations:**  
- [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/action/hero-of-all-trades/list?title_no=7401)
- [T.Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-versatile-hero/list?title_no=7147)

title: Underground of Babel (Official)
summary: Though she's a tomboy with a hangup over her tiny chest, Iori has a crush on Sota Seto, who is the pastry chef at the café where she works. Iori was sure that he wasn't interested in her until one day, he suddenly professes his love for her and goes on to kiss her. She sees him unclothed for the first time - and my, he's huge!! She never would have expected the graceful man's lips to be caressing her all over. It's terribly embarrassing, but she discovers that his you-know-what isn't gross at all…

title: Let Me Enjoy the Extra Life
Reincarnation of the Fist King
summary:
In the VRMMORPG Versus Online, Kazuya was known as the Fist King. But when he defeated the Labyrinth King Pharaoh, he woke up and had somehow been transported back to when he was 12 years old! Moreover, this world is a game world where monsters exist?! However, he can no longer use his once-invincible fists, and his stats are all at beginner level. For now, Ichiyo starts by practicing swinging a wooden staff for eight hours a day...

In a world where heavy weapons reign supreme, he aims to become the strongest by utilizing analog weapons, his fists, and the cheat skills he alone knows from the game world!

title: Perfect Secret Love: The Bad New Wife Is A Little Sweet
summary: “How perverted is Si Ye Han’s taste? He still wants me like this?” Waking up, she looked at her reflection in the mirror: explosive wig, tattoos, and demon-like makeup. Any normal person’s eyes would burn if they looked at her for more than a second.

title: Reincarnator
summary:
There was an inn with an urban legend among adventurers. "The Inn that won't let you die if you stay there."  
  
Loretta arrives at the inn as part of her quest. What is the secret of the "Deathless Inn?"  
  
"Save Point."  
  
It was an inn ran by an maxed out adventurer with the ability to create "Save Points" who came from another world. He retired from being an adventurer and decided to run an inn, while training newbie adventurers. Loretta, who needs to become strong, will be trained by the innkeeper, Alexander.  
  
If you die, don't worry about it, just hit load!  
  
  
**TL;DR**:   
Isekai + RPG Save Points + POV of a Native instead of the OP Otherworlder  


---

**WN Series Raw (12 different works)**:   
<https://ncode.syosetu.com/s1747d/>

title: Beyond Walpurgis
summary:
During the mid-19th century in Prussia, Dr. Maria Faust, known as the 'Witch of Könihilsberg' who made a pact with the devil Mephistopheles, meets Martin, a curious young man who dreams of becoming a novelist, while on a journey to find 'a way to bring the dead back to life'. . 

Faust is once knocked down by the villain Valentin, who was hostile to him, but rises again with the help of Martin, who admires her, and his student Wagner.

After that, Faust finds the truth he has been looking for, but he also realizes his mistakes... In the end, Faust finally feels the joy of life by saving the dying.

Was she really a witch?

title: Masked Knight Will Never Deceive The Villainess
summary: Can the ex-otaku villainess resist the perilous temptation coming from her beloved character, who happens to be her own killer?!

title: After Becoming a Dumpling, the Villain Family All Wants to Kill Me!
Me, The Heavenly Destined Villain
summary:
Gu Changge, a traveller from another world, comes to realize that he is the villain in this world. However, with his noble background, unrivalled abilities, and a cheat system that penalizes the protagonist, he is ready to steal the protagonist’s thunder and win the female lead’s heart…

---

**Original Webtoon:**  
- [KuaiKan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12602/)

**Official Translations:**  
- **Japanese**: 
  - [Piccoma](https://piccoma.com/web/product/119582)   
- **Korean**: 
   - [Kakao](https://page.kakao.com/content/61188260)  

- **English Ongoing**:  
  - [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/1382-i-am-the-fated-villain)
  - [Webcomics](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/I-am-the-Fated-Villain/63805b998c252b7c5e6b6b74)
  - [Mangatoon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/i-am-the-fated-villain?content_id=3446131)
  - [Alandal](https://alandal.com/series/comic-i-am-the-fated-villain)
  - [Renta](https://www.ebookrenta.com/renta/sc/frm/item/146190/)

---

- **English Discontinued**:  
  - [Voyceme](https://www.voyce.me/series/i-am-the-fated-villain)

title: Enough with the Flirting
summary:
Life in the Great Pulha Woodlands is the very definition of stillness and tranquility—and Aesir's had enough of it! That's right. Aesir isn't quite like the other high elves of the forest. For starters, he remembers living a past life as a human in another world... meaning he's got a taste for meat, adventure, and plenty of other decidedly un-elven things! He's also bored out of his skull after 120 years of the peace and quiet of their serene sylvan lifestyle. So with nothing more than his trusty bow, a bundle of life-giving fruit, and his close bond with the spirits of nature, Aesir leaves the monotony of the forest behind to seek a new life, one that's more his pace.
___
* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/enough-with-this-slow-life-i-was-reincarnated-as-a-high-elf-and-now-i-m-bored)

title: Back from the Abyss: I Am the Disaster
summary: The Immortal Emperor family was wiped out overnight, and the young master Li Chen was thrown into the most mysterious and dangerous abyss! Eight years later, he broke out of the abyss, the empress in his left hand, and the gods and demons in his right hand, and everything he went was

title: The Villainess is Busy Baking Bread!
I Helped the Imprisoned Male Lead and He Became an Obsessive Man
summary:
I possessed an errand child who brought meals to the male protagonist who was captured as a test subject at the lab. If the experiment was successful and the male protagonist gained power, the lab would be engulfed in flames. So I tried to run away before that, but I felt bad for the male protagonist who was suffering from the cruel experiment. So I secretly took care of various things while avoiding the researchers' eyes.

"Come to think of it, what's your name?"

"I don't have a name..."

"You make me one."

"Huh?"

I somehow became a little close to the male protagonist.

"Are you going to abandon me? Don't do that."

"Ah... but-"

"Anis, do you mind if I'm wrong?"

"Ugh... No. No, I don't."

"Then stay by my side."

However, the only one who can cure him who is suffering from the side effects of the experiment is the original female protagonist.

I tried to help him and leave secretly so that he could find his partner...

"You promised not to abandon me. But, was it all a lie?”

With the burning laboratory in the background, Emilien smiled with cold eyes.

“A good child should keep his promises.”

The temperature of the hand touching my cheek is cold. The red eyes close as if they are going to engulf me.

“Answer, aren’t you going to tell me?”

...What should I do?

I think I missed my chance to run away.

title: I’m Done Being Your Best Friend
ugly complex
summary:
Ajin, who's only interested in baking, is a loyal girl who thinks "the Friendship is the best!"
When the super handsome Junwoo approaches her, an ordinary girl with glasses and braces,
her daily life begins to go awry…
"Why are you so mean to me?"
"Because I like you."
A truly heart-fluttering school romance between the straightforward Junwoo and the innocent Ajin!

title: Should Not
summary:
Frim, a 5-year-old orphan living in the streets of the slums district, was a Japanese person in her past life. Her everyday life was filled with violence and injustice, and she had no one she could count on for help. What she had is "Magic That Can Produce Water" and "Modern Knowledge", that was it. Even hoping for a roof to sleep under was a luxury under such circumstances. But the world was lacking in ideas about improving working conditions, and by coming up with new ways to use Water Magic aside from producing drinking water, Frim gradually makes a name for herself!

(Source: Comic-Walker)

title: For My Lost Love
summary: The protagonist begins to get involved with the most beautiful girl in school, who is famous for her cold attitude, and slowly becomes attracted to her. That protagonist finds himself in a consulting relationship with a plain girl in glasses at his part-time job. He doesn't realize that the girl he is consulting is the same girl he is in love with, and just keeps telling her about his growing feelings while continuing to fall in love with her. The heroine realizes that the person he is in love with is herself, and although she is embarrassed by the protagonist’ feelings, she gradually becomes attracted to him.

title: How to Make My Tyrant Husband Love Me
summary:
[from cotton candy scans]  
  
“You guys are married from now on."  
  
The person I’ve admired for so long suddenly becomes my husband?! Takatsuki Honoka, 22 years old. I’ve been crushing on someone since I was in high school. He’s my father’s subordinate, the cool and handsome, yet super kind Nagakura Kousuke-san. One day, Kousuke-san suddenly becomes my husband!  
  
Official English translation on Comico's [Pocket Comics app](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics) (color edition)

title: I Underestimated My Oshi’s Attachment
summary:
Estefania worked herself to the bone for her family’s sake, while they took her for granted. One day, Estefania realized that, reincarnated in the world of her favorite novel, she was a supporting character who didn’t have much time left to live. She closed the book on her days of living in her family’s shadow, and set out to meet her oshi, the Grand Mage Synil Crown. However, as Synil is cold-hearted and ruthless, she had thought to be satisfied with just seeing him once, but before she knew it, she became the target of his attachment―!?
“S- Synil-sama, isn’t this a bit too close…?”
“In what way?”

Note: An “oshi” is a favorite member in an idol group or a favorite character from a story, movie, game, etc.

title: Black Chain
summary: The Emperor’s consort committed suicide. Hassolan, who devoted 14 years to Emperor Akelans, hung herself but woke up 14 years in the past. No matter what, she keeps returning to that day. The once cold Emperor now fiercely refuses to let her go, saying, “You are my mate. If you don’t want it, I won’t be Emperor.”

title: Dear, Not Cunning Witch
summary:
Talent doesn't always run in the family.
In an age ruled by science, there remain almighty witches with mythical powers. However, Diana ended up lacking any of her mother's witchly talent. In fact, ever since she began training at the age of 7, her only goal was to reunite with her sister. But life never turns out how we want, does it?

title: I Became The Duke’s Male Servant
summary:
The handsome Duke Voreoti is the most terrifying man in the empire, with the coldest of demeanors and a gaze that can kill. But one day, he suddenly says that he wants to… adopt a child?! And that child is me?! After finding me at a shady orphanage, he whisked me away to his snowy palace without a second thought. Now I’m learning all the ways of the feared Voreoti family from his knights. However, things get dicey when the Duke becomes suspicious of my origins. With these fangs and jet black hair, perhaps we are more than just kindred spirits…

---
"I'm going to adopt a child."

Duke Phileo Boleoti's impulsive decision shocked everyone in the mansion. Not only did he make her his daughter, but he also gave her the name of a 'beast' that only direct members of the bloodline could receive.

"Even as you breathe right now, I'm earning money."
"It's confidence, not arrogance."
"My face really does have its advantages."
The most arrogant father in the whole world, and-

"I love muscles the most. Let's get muscular."
"Show me your thigh muscles! Your butt would be even better!"
"You're nothing but a flower if you have a calm personality…" his corrupted(?) daughter. 

And… "I will give his excellency the information he wants most."

"Information I want most, you say…"

"You won’t regret it."

…A stepmother(?) with a strange secret as well.
